snippet.title: Full Metal Furies - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy/wishlist the game here:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/416600/Full_Metal_Furies/

From the creators of Rogue Legacy comes FULL METAL FURIES, a brand new team-based brawler where cooperation is essential.  Play with up to four friends in an alternate timeline where Titans still rule, and the world is on the brink of war.  Or play solo and use the "Pick 2" system and choose two teammates to join you into battle.

FMF is our take on modernizing the brawler genre for a new generation.  Everything has been redesigned, from combat, to classes, to encounters, to traversal.  Level up your party members, discover treasure, solve secrets, and end the war before it starts.

Best of all, FULL METAL FURIES supports online co-op play with Xbox One/Windows 10 cross play support, so both console and PC gamers can unite with the Furies to take down the Titans!

Coming soon in 2017...

Learn more about the game below.

Official Site:
http://www.fullmetalfuries.com

Company Site:
http://www.cellardoorgames.com

Twitter:
https://www.twitter.com/cellardoorgames

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/CellarDoorGames
